00021 /*
00022  * This file contains a C and MMX implementation of the Scale2x effect.
00023  *
00024  * You can find an high level description of the effect at :
00025  *
00026  * http://scale2x.sourceforge.net/
00027  *
00028  * Alternatively at the previous license terms, you are allowed to use this
00029  * code in your program with these conditions:
00030  * - the program is not used in commercial activities.
00031  * - the whole source code of the program is released with the binary.
00032  * - derivative works of the program are allowed.
00033  */
00034 
00035 #if HAVE_CONFIG_H
00036 #include <config.h>
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #include "scale3x.h"
00040 
00041 #include <assert.h>
00042 
00043 /***************************************************************************/
00044 /* Scale3x C implementation */
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * Define the macro USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE to enable
00048  * an optimized version which writes memory in random order.
00049  * This version is a little faster if you write in system memory.
00050  * But it's a lot slower if you write in video memory.
00051  * So, enable it only if you are sure to never write directly in video memory.
00052  */
00053 #define USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE
00054 
00055 static inline void scale3x_8_def_whole(scale3x_uint8* restrict dst0, scale3x_uint8* restrict dst1, scale3x_uint8* restrict dst2, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00056 {
00057  assert(count >= 2);
00058  
00059  /* first pixel */
00060  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00061   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00062   dst0[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00063   dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00064   dst1[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00065   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00066   dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00067   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00068   dst2[1] = (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00069   dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00070  } else {
00071   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00072   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00073   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00074   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00075   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00076   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00077   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00078   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00079   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00080  }
00081  ++src0;
00082  ++src1;
00083  ++src2;
00084  dst0 += 3;
00085  dst1 += 3;
00086  dst2 += 3;
00087  
00088  /* central pixels */
00089  count -= 2;
00090  while (count) {
00091   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00092    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00093    dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00094    dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00095    dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00096    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00097    dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00098    dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00099    dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00100    dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00101   } else {
00102    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00103    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00104    dst0[2] = src1[0];
00105    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00106    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00107    dst1[2] = src1[0];
00108    dst2[0] = src1[0];
00109    dst2[1] = src1[0];
00110    dst2[2] = src1[0];
00111   }
00112   
00113   ++src0;
00114   ++src1;
00115   ++src2;
00116   dst0 += 3;
00117   dst1 += 3;
00118   dst2 += 3;
00119   --count;
00120  }
00121  
00122  /* last pixel */
00123  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00124   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00125   dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00126   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00127   dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00128   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00129   dst1[2] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00130   dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00131   dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00132   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00133  } else {
00134   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00135   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00136   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00137   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00138   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00139   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00140   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00141   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00142   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00143  }
00144 }
00145 
00146 static inline void scale3x_8_def_border(scale3x_uint8* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00147 {
00148  assert(count >= 2);
00149  
00150  /* first pixel */
00151  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00152   dst[0] = src1[0];
00153   dst[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00154   dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00155  } else {
00156   dst[0] = src1[0];
00157   dst[1] = src1[0];
00158   dst[2] = src1[0];
00159  }
00160  ++src0;
00161  ++src1;
00162  ++src2;
00163  dst += 3;
00164  
00165  /* central pixels */
00166  count -= 2;
00167  while (count) {
00168   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00169    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00170    dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00171    dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00172   } else {
00173    dst[0] = src1[0];
00174    dst[1] = src1[0];
00175    dst[2] = src1[0];
00176   }
00177   
00178   ++src0;
00179   ++src1;
00180   ++src2;
00181   dst += 3;
00182   --count;
00183  }
00184  
00185  /* last pixel */
00186  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00187   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00188   dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00189   dst[2] = src1[0];
00190  } else {
00191   dst[0] = src1[0];
00192   dst[1] = src1[0];
00193   dst[2] = src1[0];
00194  }
00195 }
00196 
00197 static inline void scale3x_8_def_center(scale3x_uint8* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint8* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00198 {
00199  assert(count >= 2);
00200  
00201  /* first pixel */
00202  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00203   dst[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00204   dst[1] = src1[0];
00205   dst[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00206  } else {
00207   dst[0] = src1[0];
00208   dst[1] = src1[0];
00209   dst[2] = src1[0];
00210  }
00211  ++src0;
00212  ++src1;
00213  ++src2;
00214  dst += 3;
00215  
00216  /* central pixels */
00217  count -= 2;
00218  while (count) {
00219   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00220    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00221    dst[1] = src1[0];
00222    dst[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00223   } else {
00224    dst[0] = src1[0];
00225    dst[1] = src1[0];
00226    dst[2] = src1[0];
00227   }
00228   
00229   ++src0;
00230   ++src1;
00231   ++src2;
00232   dst += 3;
00233   --count;
00234  }
00235  
00236  /* last pixel */
00237  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00238   dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00239   dst[1] = src1[0];
00240   dst[2] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00241  } else {
00242   dst[0] = src1[0];
00243   dst[1] = src1[0];
00244   dst[2] = src1[0];
00245  }
00246 }
00247 
00248 static inline void scale3x_16_def_whole(scale3x_uint16* restrict dst0, scale3x_uint16* restrict dst1, scale3x_uint16* restrict dst2, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00249 {
00250  assert(count >= 2);
00251  
00252  /* first pixel */
00253  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00254   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00255   dst0[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00256   dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00257   dst1[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00258   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00259   dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00260   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00261   dst2[1] = (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00262   dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00263  } else {
00264   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00265   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00266   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00267   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00268   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00269   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00270   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00271   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00272   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00273  }
00274  ++src0;
00275  ++src1;
00276  ++src2;
00277  dst0 += 3;
00278  dst1 += 3;
00279  dst2 += 3;
00280  
00281  /* central pixels */
00282  count -= 2;
00283  while (count) {
00284   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00285    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00286    dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00287    dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00288    dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00289    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00290    dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00291    dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00292    dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00293    dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00294   } else {
00295    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00296    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00297    dst0[2] = src1[0];
00298    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00299    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00300    dst1[2] = src1[0];
00301    dst2[0] = src1[0];
00302    dst2[1] = src1[0];
00303    dst2[2] = src1[0];
00304   }
00305   
00306   ++src0;
00307   ++src1;
00308   ++src2;
00309   dst0 += 3;
00310   dst1 += 3;
00311   dst2 += 3;
00312   --count;
00313  }
00314  
00315  /* last pixel */
00316  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00317   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00318   dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00319   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00320   dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00321   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00322   dst1[2] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00323   dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00324   dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00325   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00326  } else {
00327   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00328   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00329   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00330   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00331   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00332   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00333   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00334   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00335   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00336  }
00337 }
00338 
00339 static inline void scale3x_16_def_border(scale3x_uint16* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00340 {
00341  assert(count >= 2);
00342  
00343  /* first pixel */
00344  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00345   dst[0] = src1[0];
00346   dst[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00347   dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00348  } else {
00349   dst[0] = src1[0];
00350   dst[1] = src1[0];
00351   dst[2] = src1[0];
00352  }
00353  ++src0;
00354  ++src1;
00355  ++src2;
00356  dst += 3;
00357  
00358  /* central pixels */
00359  count -= 2;
00360  while (count) {
00361   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00362    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00363    dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00364    dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00365   } else {
00366    dst[0] = src1[0];
00367    dst[1] = src1[0];
00368    dst[2] = src1[0];
00369   }
00370   
00371   ++src0;
00372   ++src1;
00373   ++src2;
00374   dst += 3;
00375   --count;
00376  }
00377  
00378  /* last pixel */
00379  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00380   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00381   dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00382   dst[2] = src1[0];
00383  } else {
00384   dst[0] = src1[0];
00385   dst[1] = src1[0];
00386   dst[2] = src1[0];
00387  }
00388 }
00389 
00390 static inline void scale3x_16_def_center(scale3x_uint16* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint16* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00391 {
00392  assert(count >= 2);
00393  
00394  /* first pixel */
00395  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00396   dst[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00397   dst[1] = src1[0];
00398   dst[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00399  } else {
00400   dst[0] = src1[0];
00401   dst[1] = src1[0];
00402   dst[2] = src1[0];
00403  }
00404  ++src0;
00405  ++src1;
00406  ++src2;
00407  dst += 3;
00408  
00409  /* central pixels */
00410  count -= 2;
00411  while (count) {
00412   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00413    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00414    dst[1] = src1[0];
00415    dst[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00416   } else {
00417    dst[0] = src1[0];
00418    dst[1] = src1[0];
00419    dst[2] = src1[0];
00420   }
00421   
00422   ++src0;
00423   ++src1;
00424   ++src2;
00425   dst += 3;
00426   --count;
00427  }
00428  
00429  /* last pixel */
00430  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00431   dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00432   dst[1] = src1[0];
00433   dst[2] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00434  } else {
00435   dst[0] = src1[0];
00436   dst[1] = src1[0];
00437   dst[2] = src1[0];
00438  }
00439 }
00440 
00441 static inline void scale3x_32_def_whole(scale3x_uint32* restrict dst0, scale3x_uint32* restrict dst1, scale3x_uint32* restrict dst2, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00442 {
00443  assert(count >= 2);
00444  
00445  /* first pixel */
00446  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00447   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00448   dst0[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00449   dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00450   dst1[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00451   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00452   dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00453   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00454   dst2[1] = (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00455   dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00456  } else {
00457   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00458   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00459   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00460   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00461   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00462   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00463   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00464   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00465   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00466  }
00467  ++src0;
00468  ++src1;
00469  ++src2;
00470  dst0 += 3;
00471  dst1 += 3;
00472  dst2 += 3;
00473  
00474  /* central pixels */
00475  count -= 2;
00476  while (count) {
00477   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00478    dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00479    dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00480    dst0[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00481    dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00482    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00483    dst1[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00484    dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00485    dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00486    dst2[2] = src1[1] == src2[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00487   } else {
00488    dst0[0] = src1[0];
00489    dst0[1] = src1[0];
00490    dst0[2] = src1[0];
00491    dst1[0] = src1[0];
00492    dst1[1] = src1[0];
00493    dst1[2] = src1[0];
00494    dst2[0] = src1[0];
00495    dst2[1] = src1[0];
00496    dst2[2] = src1[0];
00497   }
00498   
00499   ++src0;
00500   ++src1;
00501   ++src2;
00502   dst0 += 3;
00503   dst1 += 3;
00504   dst2 += 3;
00505   --count;
00506  }
00507  
00508  /* last pixel */
00509  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00510   dst0[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00511   dst0[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00512   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00513   dst1[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00514   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00515   dst1[2] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00516   dst2[0] = src1[-1] == src2[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00517   dst2[1] = (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) ? src2[0] : src1[0];
00518   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00519  } else {
00520   dst0[0] = src1[0];
00521   dst0[1] = src1[0];
00522   dst0[2] = src1[0];
00523   dst1[0] = src1[0];
00524   dst1[1] = src1[0];
00525   dst1[2] = src1[0];
00526   dst2[0] = src1[0];
00527   dst2[1] = src1[0];
00528   dst2[2] = src1[0];
00529  }
00530 }

00532 static inline void scale3x_32_def_border(scale3x_uint32* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00533 {
00534  assert(count >= 2);
00535  
00536  /* first pixel */
00537  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00538   dst[0] = src1[0];
00539   dst[1] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00540   dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00541  } else {
00542   dst[0] = src1[0];
00543   dst[1] = src1[0];
00544   dst[2] = src1[0];
00545  }
00546  ++src0;
00547  ++src1;
00548  ++src2;
00549  dst += 3;
00550  
00551  /* central pixels */
00552  count -= 2;
00553  while (count) {
00554   if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[1]) {
00555    dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00556    dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) || (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00557    dst[2] = src1[1] == src0[0] ? src1[1] : src1[0];
00558   } else {
00559    dst[0] = src1[0];
00560    dst[1] = src1[0];
00561    dst[2] = src1[0];
00562   }
00563   
00564   ++src0;
00565   ++src1;
00566   ++src2;
00567   dst += 3;
00568   --count;
00569  }
00570  
00571  /* last pixel */
00572  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[-1] != src1[0]) {
00573   dst[0] = src1[-1] == src0[0] ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00574   dst[1] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) || (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src0[0] : src1[0];
00575   dst[2] = src1[0];
00576  } else {
00577   dst[0] = src1[0];
00578   dst[1] = src1[0];
00579   dst[2] = src1[0];
00580  }
00581 }

00583 static inline void scale3x_32_def_center(scale3x_uint32* restrict dst, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src0, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src1, const scale3x_uint32* restrict src2, unsigned count)
00584 {
00585  assert(count >= 2);
00586  
00587  /* first pixel */
00588  if (src0[0] != src2[0] && src1[0] != src1[1]) {
00589   dst[0] = (src1[0] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[0]) || (src1[0] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[0]) ? src1[0] : src1[0];
00590   dst[1] = src1[0];

00592  } else {

00596  }

00606    dst[0] = (src1[-1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[-1]) || (src1[-1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[-1]) ? src1[-1] : src1[0];
00607    dst[1] = src1[0];
00608    dst[2] = (src1[1] == src0[0] && src1[0] != src2[1]) || (src1[1] == src2[0] && src1[0] != src0[1]) ? src1[1] : src1[0];

00625   dst[1] = src1[0];

00634 /**
00635  * Scale by a factor of 3 a row of pixels of 8 bits.
00636  * The function is implemented in C.
00637  * The pixels over the left and right borders are assumed of the same color of
00638  * the pixels on the border.
00639  * \param src0 Pointer at the first pixel of the previous row.
00640  * \param src1 Pointer at the first pixel of the current row.
00641  * \param src2 Pointer at the first pixel of the next row.
00642  * \param count Length in pixels of the src0, src1 and src2 rows.
00643  * It must be at least 2.
00644  * \param dst0 First destination row, triple length in pixels.
00645  * \param dst1 Second destination row, triple length in pixels.
00646  * \param dst2 Third destination row, triple length in pixels.
00647  */
00648 void scale3x_8_def(scale3x_uint8* dst0, scale3x_uint8* dst1, scale3x_uint8* dst2, const scale3x_uint8* src0, const scale3x_uint8* src1, const scale3x_uint8* src2, unsigned count)
00649 {
00650 #ifdef USE_SCALE_RANDOMWRITE
00651  scale3x_8_def_whole(dst0, dst1, dst2, src0, src1, src2, count);
00652 #else
00653  scale3x_8_def_border(dst0, src0, src1, src2, count);
00654  scale3x_8_def_center(dst1, src0, src1, src2, count);
00655  scale3x_8_def_border(dst2, src2, src1, src0, count);
00656 #endif
00657 }
00658

00661  * This function operates like scale3x_8_def() but for 16 bits pixels.

00669  * \param dst2 Third destination row, triple length in pixels.
00670  */
00671 void scale3x_16_def(scale3x_uint16* dst0, scale3x_uint16* dst1, scale3x_uint16* dst2, const scale3x_uint16* src0, const scale3x_uint16* src1, const scale3x_uint16* src2, unsigned count)
